{"id": "1da8a699533244f29128339e2ea95d5a", "page_content": "$$\n\\left\\{ \\begin{array} { l } { a _ { 1 1 } X _ { 1 } + \\cdot \\cdot \\cdot + a _ { 1 n } X _ { n } = b _ { 1 } } \\\\ { a _ { 2 1 } X _ { 1 } + \\cdot \\cdot \\cdot + a _ { 2 n } X _ { n } = b _ { 2 } } \\\\ { \\qquad \\vdots \\qquad \\vdots } \\\\ { a _ { m 1 } X _ { 1 } + \\cdot \\cdot \\cdot + a _ { m n } X _ { n } = b _ { m } , } \\end{array} \\right.\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 12, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "c6275f72bca34d909ec633895aa1f9c3", "page_content": "\u5bf9\u4e8e $\\ p \\implies q$ , \u5e38\u89c1\u7684\u8bf4\u6cd5\u662f \u201c $\\cdot \\vert$ \u4ec5\u5f53 $q ^ { , , }$ \u6216\u8005 \u201c $\\cdot _ { q }$ \u5f53 $p ^ { \\prime }$ \u201d. \u7279\u522b\u5730, $p \\iff q$ \u76f8\u5f53\u4e8e\u8bf4 \u201c $\\dot { \\boldsymbol { p } }$ \u5f53\u4e14\u4ec5\u5f53 $\\mathbf { \\Delta } q ^ { \\prime }$ \u201d.", "metadata": {"page_num": 21, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "0f6189a07da1431ba13c0f0daf145243", "page_content": "$$\n\\left\\{ s \\in S : s \\forall \\mathbb { M } \\land \\mathbb { C } \\right\\} \\quad \\exists \\mathbb { \\hat { \\chi } } \\quad \\left\\{ s \\in S \\ | \\ s \\forall \\mathbb { M } \\land \\mathbb { C } \\ \\mathcal { P } \\right\\} .\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 22, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "d10c5c6b13124f12a43ff6b41b3ee731", "page_content": "\u7b26\u53f7 $S \\subset T$ \u4ee3\u8868\u96c6\u5408 $S$ \u5305\u542b\u4e8e $T$ , \u5bb9\u8bb8\u76f8\u7b491); \u82e5 $S \\subset T$ \u800c $S \\neq T$ , \u5219\u79f0 $S$ \u4e25\u683c\u5305\u542b\u4e8e $T$ , \u6216\u79f0 $\\boldsymbol { S }$ \u662f $T$ \u7684\u771f\u5b50\u96c6, \u8bb0\u4e3a ${ \\mathit { S } } \\subsetneq { \\mathit { T } }$ .", "metadata": {"page_num": 22, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "7608d264e4e74bd49698e9f0198eb386", "page_content": "\u5bf9\u6240\u6709\u5b9e\u6570 $x$ , \u8bb0\u4e0d\u8d85\u8fc7 $x$ \u7684\u6700\u5927\u6574\u6570\u4e3a $\\lfloor x \\rfloor$ , \u6362\u8a00\u4e4b $\\lfloor x \\rfloor : = \\operatorname* { m a x } \\{ n \\in \\mathbb { Z } : n \\leq x \\}$ .", "metadata": {"page_num": 23, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "2a247a5a77e04424ba2dd41d0e7fe4f8", "page_content": "\u865a\u6570\u5355\u4f4d\u8bb0\u4e3a $\\mathbf { i } \\in \\mathbb { C }$ , \u5b83\u6ee1\u8db3 $\\mathrm { i } ^ { 2 } = - 1$ . \u5f53 $D \\in \\mathbb { R } _ { \\leq 0 }$ \u65f6, \u672c\u4e66\u89c4\u5b9a ${ \\sqrt { D } } : = { \\mathrm { i } } { \\sqrt { | D | } }$ ;\u4f5c\u4e3a\u7279\u4f8b, $\\mathrm { i } = \\sqrt { - 1 }$ .", "metadata": {"page_num": 23, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "d207de2cebbc41a98e18a29109f715b9", "page_content": "\u590d\u6570 $z$ \u7684\u5b9e\u90e8\u8bb0\u4e3a $\\mathrm { R e } ( z )$ , \u865a\u90e8\u8bb0\u4e3a $\\mathrm { I m } ( z )$ . \u590d\u6570 $z$ \u7684\u5171\u8f6d\u8bb0\u4e3a $\\overline { z }$ .", "metadata": {"page_num": 23, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "a544ad1b427b462ea1f7a6912ac46e9b", "page_content": "$$\n\\operatorname { i m } ( f ) : = \\{ f ( a ) : a \\in A \\} \\subset B .\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 23, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "d2532fc3daa44da2949afb6ea4f8f9d8", "page_content": "\u5bf9\u4efb\u610f\u5b50\u96c6 $A ^ { \\prime } \\subset A$ , \u8bb0 $f | _ { A ^ { \\prime } } : A ^ { \\prime } \\to B$ \u4e3a $f$ \u5728 $A ^ { \\prime }$ \u4e0a\u7684\u9650\u5236; \u53e6\u5916\u8bb0 $A ^ { \\prime }$ \u5728 $f$ \u4e0b\u7684\u50cf\u4e3a $f ( A ^ { \\prime } ) : = \\mathrm { i m } ( f | _ { A ^ { \\prime } } )$ . \u5728\u5fc5\u987b\u5f3a\u8c03\u6620\u5c04\u4ee5 $A$ \u7684\u5143\u7d20\u4e3a \u201c\u8f93\u5165\u201d \u7684\u573a\u5408, \u6211\u4eec\u4e5f\u91c7\u53d6\u7c7b\u4f3c$f ( \\cdot )$ \u7684\u8bb0\u6cd5.", "metadata": {"page_num": 23, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "f146107bf2cb42a4995cdbe98cb66cc5", "page_content": "\u6620\u5c04 $A { \\stackrel { f } { \\to } } B$ \u548c $B { \\xrightarrow { g } } C$ \u7684\u5408\u6210\u8bb0\u4e3a $g \\circ f : A \\to C$ , \u7b80\u8bb0\u4e3a $g f$ . \u5177\u4f53\u5b9a\u4e49\u662f", "metadata": {"page_num": 23, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "bbb39240b01c41799b9733bd91b2d7f7", "page_content": "$$\n\\mathbf { A } = { \\left( \\begin{array} { l l l } { a _ { 1 1 } } & { \\cdots } & { a _ { 1 n } } \\\\ { \\vdots } & { \\ddots } & { \\vdots } \\\\ { a _ { m 1 } } & { \\cdots } & { a _ { m n } } \\end{array} \\right) } = { \\left( \\begin{array} { l l l } & { \\vdots } & \\\\ { \\ \\cdots } & { a _ { i j } } & { \\cdots } \\\\ & { \\vdots } & \\\\ & { \\vdots } & \\end{array} \\right) }\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 24, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "1a1f418dede44a3e95bdf95776e84b73", "page_content": "\u7684\u5f62\u5f0f; \u79f0 $a _ { i j }$ \u4e3a $A$ \u7684\u7b2c $( i , j )$ \u4e2a\u77e9\u9635\u5143, \u53d6\u5728\u9009\u5b9a\u7684\u6570\u7cfb $\\mathbb { Q } , \\mathbb { R } , \\mathbb { C }$ \u6216\u66f4\u5e7f\u6cdb\u7684\u4ee3\u6570\u7ed3\u6784\u4e2d; \u8fd9\u4e9b\u77e9\u9635\u6240\u6210\u7684\u96c6\u5408\u76f8\u5e94\u5730\u8bb0\u4e3a $\\mathrm { M } _ { m \\times n } ( \\mathbb { Q } )$ , $\\mathrm { M } _ { m \\times n } ( \\mathbb { R } )$ , $\\mathrm { M } _ { m \\times n } ( \\mathbb { C } )$ , \u4f9d\u6b64\u7c7b\u63a8. \u6709\u65f6\u5bf9 $m \\times n$ \u77e9\u9635\u4e5f\u91c7\u53d6 $\\pmb { A } = ( a _ { i j } ) _ { 1 \\leq i \\leq m }$ \u7684\u8bb0\u6cd5.", "metadata": {"page_num": 25, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "0705106e33d54d2f85a224e2a7211073", "page_content": "$$\n{ } ^ { \\mathrm { t } } A = { \\left( \\begin{array} { l l l } { a _ { 1 1 } } & { \\cdots } & { a _ { m 1 } } \\\\ { \\vdots } & { \\ddots } & { \\vdots } \\\\ { a _ { 1 n } } & { \\cdots } & { a _ { m n } } \\end{array} \\right) } = ( a _ { j i } ) _ { 1 \\leq j \\leq m } .\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 25, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "fce1958639c548e997fdbdc05147a2cf", "page_content": "$$\n\\begin{array}{c} \\begin{array} { r l } { \\operatorname* { d e t } \\pmb { A } } & { \\xrightarrow { \\operatorname { g d } } } \\\\ { \\operatorname* { d e t } \\pmb { A } } & { \\xrightarrow { \\operatorname { g d } } } \\end{array} \\quad \\left| \\begin{array} { l l l } { a _ { 1 1 } } & { \\cdot \\cdot \\cdot } & { a _ { 1 n } } \\\\ { \\vdots } & { \\cdot } & { \\vdots } \\\\ { a _ { n 1 } } & { \\cdot \\cdot \\cdot } & { a _ { n n } } \\end{array} \\right|  \\end{array}\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 25, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "ec618eb4e0b0481d8438d31bb4fa1068", "page_content": "$$\n\\mathcal { X } ^ { 3 } + a \\mathcal { X } ^ { 2 } + b \\mathcal { X } + c = 0 .\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 28, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "37d673c0467c4d7dab3aeeb49f61e938", "page_content": "\u5176\u4e2d\u7684\u7cfb\u6570 $\\mathbf { \\Phi } _ { a , b , c }$ \u53ef\u4ee5\u662f\u4efb\u610f\u5b9e\u6570\u4e43\u81f3\u4e8e\u4efb\u610f\u590d\u6570, \u65e0\u5173\u5b8f\u65e8. \u6c42\u89e3\u7684\u7b2c\u4e00\u6b65\u662f\u547d$\\begin{array} { r } { X = \\mathcal { X } + \\frac { a } { 3 } } \\end{array}$ , \u5c06\u539f\u65b9\u7a0b\u5316\u4e3a", "metadata": {"page_num": 28, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "a452323262f74ffa95af03cfad7a4e15", "page_content": "$$\n\\begin{array} { r } { ( u ^ { 3 } + v ^ { 3 } + q ) + ( u + v ) ( 3 u v + p ) = 0 . } \\end{array}\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 29, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "adfbd46bc15c42b987b6ba2993b848f2", "page_content": "$$\n\\begin{array} { r } { u ^ { 3 } + v ^ { 3 } + q = 0 , } \\\\ { 3 u v + p = 0 , } \\end{array}\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 29, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "d1f6263f0a164777bf9a895fa63732a1", "page_content": "$$\n\\begin{array} { l c r } { \\left( - \\displaystyle \\frac { q } { 2 } + \\frac { \\sqrt { - 3 D } } { 2 \\cdot 3 ^ { 2 } } \\right) \\left( - \\displaystyle \\frac { q } { 2 } - \\frac { \\sqrt { - 3 D } } { 2 \\cdot 3 ^ { 2 } } \\right) = \\frac { 3 ^ { 4 } q ^ { 2 } + 3 D } { 2 ^ { 2 } 3 ^ { 4 } } } \\\\ { = \\frac { - 3 \\cdot 4 p ^ { 3 } } { 2 ^ { 2 } 3 ^ { 4 } } = \\left( - \\frac { p } { 3 } \\right) ^ { 3 } . } \\end{array}\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 29, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "688062c0dbe744e1979573af2ad46445", "page_content": "\u6240\u4ee5\u53ea\u8981\u53d6 $u$ \u548c $\\mathbf { \\sigma } _ { v }$ \u5206\u522b\u4e3a $\\begin{array} { r } { - \\frac { q } { 2 } + \\frac { \\sqrt { - 3 D } } { 2 \\cdot 3 ^ { 2 } } } \\end{array}$ \u548c $\\begin{array} { r } { - \\frac { q } { 2 } - \\frac { \\sqrt { - 3 D } } { 2 \\cdot 3 ^ { 2 } } } \\end{array}$ \u7684\u7acb\u65b9\u6839, \u5219 $u$ \u548c $\\mathbf { \\sigma } _ { v }$ \u90fd\u662f\u8f85\u52a9\u65b9\u7a0b (1.1.1) \u7684\u89e3. \u6211\u4eec\u65ad\u8a00:", "metadata": {"page_num": 29, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "cc1fef64b4f745cb9b74937b39ea622f", "page_content": "\u5206\u6210\u4e00\u822c\u60c5\u5f62 $p \\neq 0$ \u548c\u4f8b\u5916\u60c5\u5f62 $p = 0$ \u6765\u8ba8\u8bba. \u5728 $p \\neq 0$ \u7684\u524d\u63d0\u4e0b, \u4efb\u610f\u53d6\u7acb\u65b9\u6839$u$ \u548c $\\mathbf { \\sigma } _ { v }$ , \u547d $\\textstyle \\lambda : = u v / \\left( - { \\frac { p } { 3 } } \\right)$ , \u5219 (1.1.3) \u8868\u660e $\\lambda ^ { 3 } = 1$ . \u4ee5 $\\lambda ^ { - 1 } v$ \u4ee3 $\\mathbf { \\sigma } _ { v }$ \u6216\u4ee5 $\\lambda ^ { - 1 } u$ \u4ee3 $u$ , \u5373\u53ef\u786e\u4fdd $\\begin{array} { r } { u v = - \\frac { p } { 3 } } \\end{array}$ . \u4e4b\u524d\u5173\u4e8e\u8f85\u52a9\u65b9\u7a0b\u7684\u8ba8\u8bba\u5df2\u8bf4\u660e\u6b64\u65f6 $u + v$ \u7ed9\u51fa\u539f\u4e09\u6b21\u65b9\u7a0b\u7684\u89e3.", "metadata": {"page_num": 29, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "4b46594d873543e3b516ee7a59ca1a50", "page_content": "\u5bf9\u4e8e $p = 0$ \u7684\u4f8b\u5916\u60c5\u5f62, \u6211\u4eec\u6709 $- 3 D = 3 ^ { 4 } q ^ { 2 }$ , \u800c $\\begin{array} { r } { - \\frac { q } { 2 } \\pm \\frac { \\sqrt { - 3 D } } { 2 \\cdot 3 ^ { 2 } } } \\end{array}$ \u4e2d\u5fc5\u6709\u4e00\u8005\u4e3a 0. \u6240\u4ee5\u6b64\u65f6 $\\begin{array} { r } { u v = 0 = - \\frac { p } { 3 } } \\end{array}$ \u81ea\u52a8\u6210\u7acb, \u800c\u4e14 $\\boldsymbol { u } ^ { 3 } + \\boldsymbol { v } ^ { 3 } = - \\boldsymbol { q }$ . \u6240\u4ee5\u5728\u4f8b\u5916\u60c5\u5f62\u4e0b $u + v$ \u4f9d\u7136\u7ed9\u51fa\u89e3. \u65ad\u8a00\u5f97\u8bc1.", "metadata": {"page_num": 29, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "a3e12f3e19b8444e8fd8a16a07ba7d69", "page_content": "\u4e8e\u662f $\\begin{array} { r } { - \\frac { q } { 2 } + \\frac { \\sqrt { - 3 D } } { 2 \\cdot 3 ^ { 2 } } } \\end{array}$ \u548c $\\begin{array} { r } { - \\frac { q } { 2 } - \\frac { \\sqrt { - 3 D } } { 2 \\cdot 3 ^ { 2 } } } \\end{array}$ \u7684\u7acb\u65b9\u6839\u5206\u522b\u662f ", "metadata": {"page_num": 30, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "c07192713d7c4b009bbe65c912e1cfdb", "page_content": "\u8fd9\u4e9b\u7acb\u65b9\u6839\u53ef\u4ee5\u9002\u5f53\u5730\u6392\u5e8f, \u8bb0\u4e3a $u _ { 1 } , u _ { 2 } , u _ { 3 }$ \u548c $\\boldsymbol { v } _ { 1 } , \\boldsymbol { v } _ { 2 } , \\boldsymbol { v } _ { 3 }$ , \u4f7f\u5f97 $\\begin{array} { r } { u _ { i } v _ { i } = - \\frac { p } { 3 } } \\end{array}$ \u5bf9 $i = { 1 , 2 , 3 }$ \u7686\u6210\u7acb. \u8fd9\u5c31\u7ed9\u51fa\u4e86 $X ^ { 3 } + p X + q$ \u7684\u4e09\u4e2a\u6839 (\u5bb9\u8bb8\u91cd\u590d):", "metadata": {"page_num": 30, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "407ce6ca6b0c4a6682ecb23cf20648fc", "page_content": "\u63d0\u793a \u8003\u8651\u5148\u524d\u8bba\u8bc1\u4e2d\u7684\u7acb\u65b9\u6839 $u , v$ , \u6ee1\u8db3 $\\begin{array} { r } { u v = - \\frac { p } { 3 } } \\end{array}$ ; \u8bf4\u660e $u + v , \\rho u + \\rho ^ { 2 } v , \\rho ^ { 2 } u + \\rho v$ \u6709\u6240\u91cd\u590d\u5f53\u4e14\u4ec5\u5f53 $u \\in \\{ v , \\rho v , \\rho ^ { 2 } v \\}$ . \u82e5\u6b64\u6761\u4ef6\u6210\u7acb, \u5219\u4e24\u8fb9\u53d6\u7acb\u65b9\u7ed9\u51fa", "metadata": {"page_num": 30, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}

{"id": "949d9b034e064be59bf96f2a1e3e4e01", "page_content": "\u56db\u6b21\u65b9\u7a0b\u7684\u516c\u5f0f\u89e3\u662f G. Cardano \u53ca\u5176\u5b66\u751f $\\mathrm { ~ L ~ }$ . Ferrari \u7684\u5de5\u4f5c, \u540c\u6837\u89c1\u4e8e ArsMagma; $n \\geq 5$ \u7684\u60c5\u5f62\u5219\u957f\u671f\u56f0\u6270\u7740\u6b64\u540e\u7684\u6570\u5b66\u5bb6\u4eec, \u76f4\u81f3 N. H. {"id": "c6ff175692b24195a6b2a04e8319eba6", "page_content": "$$\nA = \\left( { \\begin{array} { c c c } { a _ { 1 1 } } & { \\cdots } & { a _ { 1 n } } \\\\ { \\vdots } & { \\ddots } & { \\vdots } \\\\ { a _ { m 1 } } & { \\cdots } & { a _ { m n } } \\end{array} } \\right) , \\quad B = \\left( { \\begin{array} { c c c } { b _ { 1 1 } } & { \\cdots } & { b _ { 1 n } } \\\\ { \\vdots } & { \\ddots } & { \\vdots } \\\\ { b _ { m 1 } } & { \\cdots } & { b _ { m n } } \\end{array} } \\right) .\n$$", "metadata": {"page_num": 47, "file_id": "b74139163a41439e8e3d4c31ca642a7d"}}
